about.title: About China Cars Export
about.subtitle: Your Global B2B Partner in Chinese Automotive Export

company.title: Company Introduction
company.intro: We are a Chinese automotive enterprise with 20 years of development history, possessing rich export experience in both passenger and commercial vehicles. Our export portfolio covers complete vehicle export (including used car export), KD (Knock Down) kits, and customized modifications.
company.achievement: To date, our vehicles have been sold to over 40 countries, serving more than 20,000 users. The company has a complete R&D system, advanced production processes, and strict quality control systems, enabling us to meet diverse requirements across different regions and scenarios.

vision.title: Corporate Vision
vision.description: Through modification and diversified product services, we provide high-quality automotive export solutions for global customers.

values.title: Corporate Values
values.description: Innovation and Change, Customer-oriented, Professional Excellence, Win-win Cooperation

mission.title: Corporate Mission
mission.description: To become a globally recognized leader in diversified automotive product exports, shaping industry standards through innovation and service.

warehouses.title: Global Warehouse Network
warehouses.subtitle: Strategically located warehouses across 13 countries to ensure fast delivery and local support

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: We are committed to providing customers with comprehensive automotive export solutions through advanced technology, strict quality control, and excellent service, ensuring that every vehicle meets the highest standards.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: All vehicles undergo thorough inspection before export

support.title: Full Support
